Player History
Earned first career win on 5/24/1966...
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Had first career hit on 9/18/1967, off Clyde Wright (BOS)...
Injured on 5/17/1969 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/17/1969 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1971...
Traded from Minnesota to Philadelphia on 1/31/1972 (Going to PHI: P C. Nieson, CF J. Hicks, P A. Hrabosky. Going to MIN: P J. Franklin, P J. Dukes)...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 8/18/1975 to a 1-year deal worth $1,796,000 per year...
